verses.verse: And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> to <S%H1066>Bochim<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I made you to go <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and have <S%H935>brought<s%> you unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>; and I <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H6565>break<s%> my covenant with <S%H1285>you<s%>:

and ye shall <S%H3772>make<s%> no <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this <S%H776>land<s%>; ye shall break <S%H5422>down<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%>. But ye have not <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto my <S%H6963>voice<s%>: why have ye done <S%H6213>this<s%>?

Wherefore I also <S%H559>said<s%>, I will not drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6654>you<s%>; but they shall be as thorns in your sides, and their <S%H430>gods<s%> shall be a snare unto <S%H4170>you<s%>.

And it came to <S%H4397>pass<s%>, when the angel of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> unto all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that the <S%H5971>people<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%>.
And they <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1066>Bochim<s%>: and they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> there unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Now when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had sent the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> that <S%H3117>outlived<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, who had <S%H7200>seen<s%> all the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that he had <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H4191>died<s%>, being a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>.

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in <S%H8556>Timnath-heres<s%>, in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, on the north of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash<s%>.

And also all that <S%H1755>generation<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>: and there <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3045>them<s%>, that knew not <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, nor yet the <S%H4639>work<s%> which he had <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>;

and they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, who brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> that were round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H7812>them<s%>, and bowed themselves down unto <S%H3068>them<s%>: and they provoked Jehovah to <S%H3707>anger<s%>.
And they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baal<s%> and the <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%>.

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and he <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H8154>spoilers<s%> that <S%H8155>despoiled<s%> <S%H4376>them<s%>; and he sold them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, so that they <S%H3201>could<s%> not any <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

Whithersoever they went <S%H3318>out<s%>, the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was against them for <S%H7451>evil<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, and as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto <S%H3966>them<s%>: and they were sore <S%H3334>distressed<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> raised <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%>, who <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those that despoiled <S%H8154>them<s%>.

And yet they <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto their <S%H8199>judges<s%>; for they played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> themselves down unto <S%H5493>them<s%>: they turned aside <S%H4118>quickly<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> wherein their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%>, <S%H8085>obeying<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; but they did not <S%H6213>so<s%>.

And when <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6965>raised<s%> them up <S%H8199>judges<s%>, then <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was with the <S%H8199>judge<s%>, and <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8199>judge<s%>: for it <S%H5162>repented<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of their <S%H5009>groaning<s%> by reason of them that <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> them and vexed <S%H1766>them<s%>.

But it came to <S%H8199>pass<s%>, when the judge was <S%H4194>dead<s%>, that they <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7843>back<s%>, and dealt more corruptly than their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, in <S%H3212>following<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H7812>them<s%>, and to bow down unto <S%H5307>them<s%>; they ceased not from their <S%H4611>doings<s%>, nor from their <S%H7186>stubborn<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>.

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Because this <S%H1471>nation<s%> have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and have not <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto my <S%H6963>voice<s%>;

I also will not <S%H3254>henceforth<s%> drive <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> them of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> when he <S%H4191>died<s%>;

that by them I may <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whether they will <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H1>therein<s%>, as their fathers did keep <S%H8104>it<s%>, or not.

So <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3240>left<s%> those <S%H1471>nations<s%>, <S%H1115>without<s%> driving them <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H4118>hastily<s%>; neither <S%H5414>delivered<s%> he them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>.
